body_html:
The package dependency seems incorrect.
if I run conda install -c pytorch pytorch-nightly

The following packages will be downloaded:

    package                    |            build
    ---------------------------|-----------------
    ninja-1.8.2                |       h6bb024c_1         1.3 MB
    pytorch-nightly-2018.04.08 |py36_cuda8.0.61_cudnn7.1.2_1       605.9 MB  pytorch
    cudatoolkit-9.0            |       h13b8566_0       340.4 MB
    ------------------------------------------------------------
                                           Total:       947.7 MB

Which results in libcudart.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

body:
The package dependency seems incorrect.
if I run `conda install -c pytorch pytorch-nightly`
```
The following packages will be downloaded:

    package                    |            build
    ---------------------------|-----------------
    ninja-1.8.2                |       h6bb024c_1         1.3 MB
    pytorch-nightly-2018.04.08 |py36_cuda8.0.61_cudnn7.1.2_1       605.9 MB  pytorch
    cudatoolkit-9.0            |       h13b8566_0       340.4 MB
    ------------------------------------------------------------
                                           Total:       947.7 MB
```

Which results in `libcudart.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory`
